AAF.caption: Use element IDs for headers (when available)
AAF.doc: Use the inputted ID attribute for elements for the CSV column headers (default headers will be used where no ID is provided)
AAF.name: useElementIds

AAa.caption: File Type
AAa.doc: Set the separator for the exported file
AAa.name: file_type

AAe.caption: Quotes to use around escaped cells
AAe.doc: Choose a type of quotes to use to surround cells that contain characters which must be escaped. For example, if a cell contains a comma and the CSV uses commas to separate the cells, the text of this cell will be surrounded by quotes.
AAe.name: quote_char
